definition: a gambling card game in which chips are placed on the ace and king and queen and jack of separate suits (taken from a separate deck)
details:
noun
- a gambling card game in which chips are placed on the ace and king and queen and jack of separate suits (taken from a separate deck)
= synonyms: stops
- informal terms for money
= synonyms: wampum, scratch, lolly, bread, cabbage, kale, kail, lettuce, dough, sugar, lucre, loot, clams, dinero, gelt, moolah, pelf, shekels, simoleons
